attributes.action: Review lockdown on fishing at fisheries
attributes.additional_details: All it takes is the fisheries to provide bacterial wipes for the gates and toilet facilities, anglers only touch there own equipment and most swims are 8-10feet apart. If you can set ground rules we will abide by them, a lot of us anglers use fishing for mental health. It’s our exercise and break from reality, which is very much needed.
attributes.background: Please review the ban on fishing at fisheries, I am a avid carp fisherman and we Social distance more then most anglers.
